column1: #Text=Iroh says : " Thank you for the duck .
#Text=It brings me pleasure to see someone eat my cooking with such ... gusto .
#Text=" Iroh says : " Junior , where are your manners ?
#Text=You need to thank these nice people .
#Text=" Song says : " I know you do n't think there 's any hope left in the world , but there is hope .
#Text=" Iroh says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=These people just showed you great kindness .
#Text=" Zuko says : " They 're about to show us a little more kindness .
